title.narrative: D?ici 2021, les enfants, les femmes et leurs familles en milieu rural et urbain ont un acces ameliore a des services etinfrastructures d?eau surs et geres de maniere durable.

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF continued to support improved access to safe drinking water. Thanks to UNICEF direct support, 34,685 additional people, including 28,685 people in emergency response, gained a sustainable access to safe drinking water through the construction of 5 water supply piped systems and 6 water points despite delays in implementation due to long contracting processes, the incidence of the COVID-19 context and of the socio-political and insecurity situation resulting in fuel shortage and roadblocks. | Status:Met | As-of Date:16/01/2022
